channel.title: Universalserver 317,recruting client coders
channel.description:
Hello! iv been working with my server for a week now,and i would like to recruit more coders to make the work faster,and better ideas the things what you as a coder would have to do is,basic (doors,gates,spawnconfigs and so on) test server is already running on vps,so its up 24/7 for testing(no home hosts and laggy)
WORK SO FAR*
*Axe hunt added *Clan chat fixed *Most Dupes fixed *Pirate Ship added *Pirate House added *broken house dungeon added(wild) *fixed agililty bug, *added some shops *removed pointless stalls from home(going to add them somewhere els) 24.08 *added cooking *added fishing *added agility *added quest tab commands *started with don island 25.08 *added fishing emotes,almost done now *started with firemaking *added more commands *edited bit don island - lot of work to be done :)
some pictures,to keep this not so boring text topic. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/755147/pilt6.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/760504/pilt4.JPG[/img]
!PS i owe so much to vain,thank you for helping and making it alot easier for me ;)

item.title: Universalserver 317,recruting client coders
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Please provide some proof that this development is going to be successful by posting images and other progress. I will give you 24 hours to edit your topic to comply with the section rules: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,393334.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Universalserver 317,recruting client coders
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

Hello!
iv been working with my server for a week now,and i would like to recruit more coders to make the work faster,and better ideas
the things what you as a coder would have to do is,basic (doors,gates,spawnconfigs and so on)
test server is already running on vps,so its up 24/7 for testing(no home hosts and laggy)

WORK SO FAR*

*Axe hunt added
*Clan chat fixed
*Most Dupes fixed
*Pirate Ship added
*Pirate House added
*broken house dungeon added(wild)
*fixed agililty bug,
*added some shops
*removed pointless stalls from home(going to add them somewhere els)
24.08
*added cooking
*added fishing
*added agility
*added quest tab commands
*started with don island
25.08
*added fishing emotes,almost done now
*started with firemaking
*added more commands
*edited bit don island - lot of work to be done

some pictures,to keep this not so boring text topic.

!PS i owe so much to vain,thank you for helping and making it alot easier for me

Read full topic
